dataList.name: 情报传递
dataList.desc: 使在仪表盘上的位置位于自身之后的2名友方获得1层“强袭”。

dataList.name: 洞若观火
dataList.desc: 拼点时，使对方的拼点威力减少(暴食共鸣/4)点。

dataList.name: 镇静自若
dataList.desc: 拼点胜利时，使自身获得1层“呼吸法”。

dataList.name: 明察秋毫
dataList.desc: 攻击带有减益的目标时，造成的伤害+10%。

dataList.name: 自行充能
dataList.desc: 攻击命中时，获得1层“充能”。

dataList.name: 决心
dataList.desc: 下回合开始时，若自身的“呼吸法”层数不低于4层，则使自身获得2层“迅捷”。

dataList.name: 正义裁决
dataList.desc: 技能拼点胜利时，造成的伤害增加10%。

dataList.name: 快速充能
dataList.desc: 战斗开始时，获得(忧郁共鸣数/3)层“充能”。

dataList.name: 有备无患
dataList.desc: 下回合开始时，使自身获得(愤怒共鸣数/3)层“迅捷”。

dataList.name: 万般皆艺
dataList.desc: 造成与受到的伤害增加25%。

dataList.name: 刀.断.
dataList.desc: 本回合内斩击伤害+(暴食共鸣数/2)%。

dataList.name: Dark Cloud Blade
dataList.desc: Deal +(Lust Res.)% damage to targets with Bleed.

dataList.name: Resolution
dataList.desc: At less than 50% HP, gain 1 Protection at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Great Mountain
dataList.desc:
When attacked, inflict 1 Burn on the attacker.
Activates (Lust Res. / 2) times per turn.

dataList.name: Enduring Spirit
dataList.desc:
When attacked, gain +1 Charge Count.
Activates (Envy Res. / 2) times per turn.

dataList.name: Entertainment
dataList.desc: Heal 6 SP next turn.

dataList.name: Dark Cloud Blade
dataList.desc: The last Coin on the last skill in the chain inflicts (Lust Res. / 3) Bleed.

dataList.name: Gaiety
dataList.desc: Heal (2x Gluttony Res.) SP next turn.

dataList.name: Ressentiment
dataList.desc: Deal +10% damage to targets with higher Max HP.

dataList.name: Respiration
dataList.desc: After taking damage from attacks this turn, boost damage by (2x Wrath Res.)%

dataList.name: Raring to Graze
dataList.desc:
Gain (Wrath Res.) Charge Count next turn.
At 5+ Charge Count, gain 1 Haste and Attack Power Up.

dataList.name: Last-ditch Struggle
dataList.desc: At less than 25% HP, gain +1 clash Power in a clash.

dataList.name: Brainwave Focus
dataList.desc:
At the start of the combat phase, lose 15 SP.
Gain (Gloom Res / 3) Attack Power Up next turn.

dataList.name: Walking the Line of Death
dataList.desc: At less than 50% HP, gain 1 additional Poise from skills.

dataList.name: Eye for Weakness
dataList.desc: Attacks inflict 1 Tremor in a won clash.

dataList.name: Split Evil
dataList.desc: On hit, inflict 1 Bleed at a (10x Wrath Res.)% chance.

dataList.name: Dark Cloud Blade
dataList.desc: At 5+ Poise, counter skills use Skill 3.

dataList.name: Breach Defense
dataList.desc: Deal +(Envy Res.)% damage to enemies that used defense skills this turn.

dataList.name: Resolution
dataList.desc: When an ally is defeated, gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn.

dataList.name: Slayer
dataList.desc: The last Coin on the last skill in the chain deals +(2x Pride Res.)% damage.

dataList.name: Your Shield
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, apply 2 Defense Power Up and 1 Protection to allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard.

dataList.name: Júbilo Hedonista
dataList.desc: After a successful evade, lower Stagger Threshold by the evade skill’s Power at a (5x Gloom Res.)% chance.

dataList.name: Executor
dataList.desc: If target’s SP is below 0, deal +10% damage.

dataList.name: Levelheaded
dataList.desc: Deal +(2x Pride Res.)% damage to enemies with less than 25% HP.

dataList.name: Morale Boost
dataList.desc: Next turn, apply 2 Haste to self and allies who are adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard this turn.

dataList.name: Forced Survival
dataList.desc: Heal 5 HP at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Ignition
dataList.desc: The 3rd and subsequent Coins of a skill inflict (Sloth Res. / 3) Burn on hit.

dataList.name: Emergency Rations
dataList.desc: At less than 25% HP, heal (Gluttony Res. / 3)% HP on clash win.

dataList.name: Information Neutralization
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, Heal 10 SP for 1 ally with the lowest SP if they lost SP.

dataList.name: Analytic Eye
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest Max HP gains +1 clash Power in a clash.

dataList.name: Bestow
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest SP gains +1 Poise Count from skills.

dataList.name: Keen Observation
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest Max HP inflicts 1 Offense Level Down with attacks at a 25% chance.

dataList.name: Radio Comms
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Max HP gains +1 Charge Count.

dataList.name: Backing
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Max HP gains +2 defense skill final Power.

dataList.name: Support
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest SP deals +10% Pierce damage.

dataList.name: Broken Spirit
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest Speed gains +1 final Power for their first skill.

dataList.name: Divide in Two
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest Speed deals +10% Slash damage.

dataList.name: Hustle
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Max HP deals and takes +20% damage.

dataList.name: Ice Breaker
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Max HP inflicts +1 Rupture.

dataList.name: Muscle in Charge
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest Speed inflicts +1 Bleed.

dataList.name: Backup
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest Max HP takes -10% damage from attack skills.

dataList.name: Friction Point
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Speed inflicts +1 Burn.

dataList.name: Taciturn
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Speed inflicts +1 Rupture.

dataList.name: Frivolous Jokes
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, the ally with the lowest SP heals 6 SP.

dataList.name: Syndicate Payback
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest Speed inflicts +1 Bleed.

dataList.name: Gambit
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest SP deals +20% damage with Heads Coins.

dataList.name: Spite-driven
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Max HP deals +10% Blunt damage.

dataList.name: Self-neglect
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest HP deals and takes +20% damage.

dataList.name: Tenacity
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest Speed deals +10% Pierce damage.

dataList.name: Determination to Survive
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest HP and less than 50% of Max HP gains +1 clash Power in a clash.

dataList.name: Tenacity
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest SP deals +10% Blunt damage.

dataList.name: Strife
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest HP gains +2 counter skill final Power.

dataList.name: By the Manual
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Speed gains +2 guard skill final Power.

dataList.name: Gambler
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest HP deals +20% damage with Heads Coins.

dataList.name: Dark Cloud Swordsmanship
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Speed deals +10% Slash damage.

dataList.name: Breaching
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest HP deals +20% damage to enemies that used defense skills this turn.

dataList.name: Conscience
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest SP gains 1 Attack Power Up the turn after an ally is defeated.

dataList.name: Bloodied Hands
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Speed gains +1 final Power for their last skill.

dataList.name: Stubbornness
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest HP takes -10% damage.

dataList.name: Jugar con Enemigos
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest SP deals +10% damage to enemies with lower SP.

dataList.name: Military Mindset
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest HP deals +30% damage to enemies below 0 SP.

dataList.name: Double Tap
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest SP deals +30% damage to enemies below 25% HP.

dataList.name: Resolution
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest HP randomly gains 1 Attack Power Up, 1 Defense Power Up, or 1 Protection at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Gene Code G-0
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, the ally with the lowest HP heals 5 HP.

dataList.name: Rushing Heart
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Speed deals +30% damage with their 3rd and subsequent Coins.

dataList.name: Gene Code G-3
dataList.desc: The ally with the lowest HP heals 5 HP after winning a clash.

dataList.name: Wrath
dataList.desc: Deal +1 damage with attacks after every successful hit this turn.

dataList.name: Wrath
dataList.desc: Give a random ally the following effect: Deal +1 damage with attacks after every successful hit this turn.

dataList.name: Lust
dataList.desc: When hit by an attack this turn, heal 3 HP at a 50% chance.

dataList.name: Lust
dataList.desc: Give a random ally the following effect: When hit by an attack this turn, heal 3 HP at a 50% chance.

dataList.name: Sloth
dataList.desc: Take 1 less damage this turn.

dataList.name: Sloth
dataList.desc: Give a random ally the following effect: Take 1 less damage this turn.

dataList.name: Gluttony
dataList.desc: Heal 5 HP at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Gluttony
dataList.desc: Give a random ally the following effect: Heal 5 HP at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Gloom
dataList.desc: Heal 5 SP at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Gloom
dataList.desc: Give a random ally the following effect: Heal 5 SP at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Pride
dataList.desc: Deal +2 damage after winning a clash.

dataList.name: Pride
dataList.desc: Give a random ally the following effect: Deal +2 damage after winning a clash.

dataList.name: Envy
dataList.desc: When hit by an attack this turn, deal 1 damage to the attacker at a 25% chance.

dataList.name: Envy
dataList.desc: Give a random ally the following effect: When hit by an attack this turn, deal 1 damage to the attacker at a 25% chance.

dataList.name: Obsessive Hammer
dataList.desc: When below 50% HP, remove 1 negative status effect and gain 1 Fanatic, 1 Attack Power Up, and 3 Protection.

dataList.name: Joy of Execution
dataList.desc:
After an enemy is defeated, gain 1 Haste and 1 Damage Up next turn.
If this unit defeated an enemy, also gain 1 Fanatic. (Once per turn.)

dataList.name: Highest Honor
dataList.desc:
Apply 1 Attack Power Up and 1 Protection to the ally with the lowest HP.
If the ally is from N Corp, also apply 1 Fanatic.

dataList.name: Rising Faith
dataList.desc: After an enemy is defeated, apply 1 Haste and 1 Damage Up to the ally with the highest SP. (Once per turn.)
